title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy, then remove from heat.
Beat eggs with grated cheese and a good pinch of pepper.
Drain pasta (reserve some cooking water) and return to pot.
Quickly toss pasta with egg-cheese mixture and pancetta, adding a splash of pasta water to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra grated cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka spice for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked through and slightly charred.
Sauté onions, add tomatoes and simmer to make a sauce.
Stir in cream and return chicken to the sauce, simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Quick and healthy mixed vegetable stir-fry with soy sauce and sesame.
instructions: Heat oil in a wok and sauté garlic for 30 seconds.
Add vegetables and stir-fry over high heat until tender-crisp.
Add soy sauce and toss to coat.
Serve immediately with rice or noodles.

title: Chocolate Brownies
summary: Rich and fudgy chocolate brownies with a crackly top.
instructions: Melt chocolate and butter together, then stir in sugar.
Add eggs one at a time, then fold in flour.
Bake in a preheated oven at 180°C (350°F) for 20–25 minutes.
Cool, cut into squares and serve.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Creamy avocado smashed over toasted sourdough with chili flakes and lemon.
instructions: Toast the bread to your liking.
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Spread avocado over toast and sprinkle chili flakes if desired.
Serve immediately.
